org.hps.recon.tracking

Class ShaperLinearFitAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.tracking.ShaperLinearFitAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FCNBase, ShaperFitAlgorithm

    public class ShaperLinearFitAlgorithm
extends Object
implements ShaperFitAlgorithm, FCNBase
    Fast fitter; currently only fits single hits. Uses Tp from ChannelConstants; fits values and errors for T0 and amplitude.
